artificer.name: Artificer
artificer.description: Masters of invention, artificers use ingenuity and magic to unlock extraordinary capabilities in objects.

barbarian.name: Barbarian
barbarian.description: A fierce warrior of primitive background who can enter a battle rage.

bard.name: Bard
bard.description: A master of song, speech, and the magic they contain.

cleric.name: Cleric
cleric.description: A priestly champion who wields divine magic in service of a higher power.

druid.name: Druid
druid.description: A priest of the Old Faith, wielding the elemental forces of nature and transforming into animal forms.

fighter.name: Fighter
fighter.description: A master of martial combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor.

monk.name: Monk
monk.description: A master of martial arts, harnessing the power of the body in pursuit of physical and spiritual perfection.

paladin.name: Paladin
paladin.description: A holy warrior bound to a sacred oath.

ranger.name: Ranger
ranger.description: A warrior of the wilderness, skilled in tracking, survival, and combat.

rogue.name: Rogue
rogue.description: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery to overcome obstacles.

sorcerer.name: Sorcerer
sorcerer.description: A spellcaster who draws on inherent magic from a gift or bloodline.

warlock.name: Warlock
warlock.description: A wielder of magic that is derived from a bargain with an extraplanar entity.

wizard.name: Wizard
wizard.description: A scholarly magic-user capable of manipulating the structures of spells to suit their needs.
